name: Samsung A257 Magnet
description: A basic feature phone from Samsung, the A257 Magnet offers essential communication functions, including calling and texting, in a compact and durable design. Ideal for users who prefer simple functionality without the complexity of a smartphone.

name: Prestigio MultiPad 7.0 HD +
description: This tablet runs on Android 4.1 and provides users with a 7-inch HD screen, making it a portable solution for browsing, media playback, and basic apps. Suitable for light use and entertainment on the go.

name: Lenovo A830
description: A mid-range Android 4.2.1 smartphone, the Lenovo A830 features a large display and a reliable processor for everyday tasks. It’s a great budget option for those looking for decent performance without the high price tag.

name: Infinix Hot 7
description: The Infinix Hot 7 is an Android 8.0 smartphone designed for those seeking affordable performance. It offers a large display and a decent camera, making it a practical choice for budget-conscious consumers.

name: BLU Studio M HD
description: The BLU Studio M HD is an Android 5.1 device with a sleek design and a high-definition display. It’s perfect for users looking for an affordable smartphone with good media capabilities and solid day-to-day performance.

name: VK Mobile VK580
description: The VK Mobile VK580 is a feature phone that offers simplicity and reliability. Its compact size and basic functionality make it suitable for users who need a straightforward phone for calls and texts.

name: Micromax Evok Dual Note E4815
description: The Micromax Evok Dual Note E4815 is an Android 7.0 smartphone with dual rear cameras for enhanced photography. It combines performance and style at an affordable price, making it a solid mid-range option.

name: BLU Studio C HD
description: BLU Studio C HD runs on Android 5.1 and offers a large screen with vibrant colors. It is designed for users looking for a budget-friendly smartphone with good media and app performance.

name: Lava Fuel F1
description: Lava Fuel F1 is an Android 5.1 smartphone built for endurance, with a long-lasting battery and smooth performance for everyday tasks. It’s ideal for users looking for reliability on a budget.

name: Philips 399
description: Philips 399 is a feature phone that prioritizes functionality over complexity. With its easy-to-use interface, it is designed for those who value straightforward communication tools without unnecessary features.

name: Unnecto Eco
description: The Unnecto Eco is a budget feature phone, ideal for users who need basic mobile communication without the complexity of a smartphone. Compact and durable, it’s designed for everyday use.

name: LG L Prime
description: LG L Prime is an Android 4.4.2 smartphone with a large display and reliable performance. It’s a solid choice for users looking for a good balance between price and functionality.

name: Sagem my231x
description: Sagem my231x is a simple and affordable feature phone, offering essential communication functions in a compact, easy-to-use design. Perfect for users who prioritize basic mobile services.

name: Samsung I9003 Galaxy SL
description: Samsung I9003 Galaxy SL is an Android 2.2 device with upgradable features and TouchWiz UI. It’s designed for users who enjoy customization and basic multimedia capabilities.

name: vivo U20
description: The vivo U20 is a powerful Android 9.0 smartphone that delivers excellent performance with its large display, fast processor, and impressive camera. It’s a great option for users seeking high-end features at a mid-range price.

name: alcatel Miss Sixty 2009
description: The alcatel Miss Sixty 2009 is a retro feature phone with a unique design, providing basic mobile communication in a stylish package. Ideal for users who prefer an unconventional and compact device.

name: Samsung T929 Memoir
description: Samsung T929 Memoir is a feature phone with advanced multimedia capabilities, offering an excellent camera and a sleek design. It’s a great choice for users looking for photography-focused devices.

name: Lava P7
description: Lava P7 is an Android 5.1 smartphone designed for users who need a balance between performance and affordability. Its upgradable system ensures continued compatibility with newer apps and software.

name: Samsung P940
description: Samsung P940 is a feature phone that offers basic communication with a premium look. It is designed for users who need reliability in a sleek, compact design without the complexity of a smartphone.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 P3110
os: Android 4.0.3, up to 4.2.2, TouchWiz UX UI
description: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 P3110 is a compact Android 4.0 tablet that offers smooth performance for media, browsing, and apps. Its user-friendly TouchWiz UX UI makes it a great device for everyday use.
